name: Cyberpunk Atlanta: A Rouge Hacker's Journey
name_original: Cyberpunk Atlanta: A Rouge Hacker's Journey
description: Embark on an intense and thrilling adventure as a rogue hacker in our choose your own adventure game. With over 250 passages and 50 possible endings, you'll navigate a dark and dangerous world filled with hacking and espionage. Build your hacking empire, take on an AI determined to dominate the world, and face the consequences of your choices. Will you come out on top or meet a fiery end? This game, made with Twine, offers endless possibilities for a unique and immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
